overview: Created thanks to the funds provided for the production of new artworks awarded to Dora Garc√≠a for the 45th PIAC, The Joycean Society is a film about a book club dedicated to James Joyce's Finnegans Wake; The Zurich-based group of students, admirers and connoisseurs read and dissect passages from what is often said to be "the most difficult book in the world".
title: The Joycean Society
